statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 12 \\ -3 \\ -21 \\ -18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -10 \\ -1 \\ 13 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
